state: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! First step, go to the east. Following that, attempt to go south. After that, take a trip east. Then, attempt to move east. Okay, and then, make an attempt to go north. Once you manage that, make an attempt to go to the north. After that, move east. Then, venture north. Then, take a trip west. With that accomplished, make an attempt to head south. That done, take a trip south. Then, try to move east. And then, try to head south. That done, attempt to take a trip west. Then, pick up the coin from the floor of the bedroom. Once that's all handled, you can stop! -= Study =- Well, here we are in a study. There is an unguarded exit to the east. > -= Study =-0/1
